title: Adaniâ€™s Kenya transmission deals still under talks, agency says
description: Kenya Electricity Transmission Co. is still negotiating with Adani Energy Solutions Ltd. for the construction of three power lines, despite earlier claims of a finalized deal. The project cost has been revised to $736.5 million. Kenya faces a $5 billion financing gap for power lines and seeks the best deal.
